text: "Request + Line" is a 2001 song by Black Eyed Peas featuring Macy Gray. It is the third single from their second studio album Bridging the Gap. It went to number 31 in the United Kingdom, number 63 in the United States, number 10 in New Zealand, number 45 in Scotland and number 21 in Australia. It was their first entry in the Billboard Hot 100 chart in the United States. ==Track listing== ; United Kingdom # "Request + Line" - 3:53 # "Request + Line" (Trackmasters Remix) - 3:50 # "Joints & Jam" (The Joint Mix) - 3:37 # "Request + Line" (Music Video) ; America # "Request + Line" - 3:53 # "Request + Line" (Instrumental) - 3:56 # "Request + Line" (Trackmasters Remix) - 3:51 # "Request + Line" (Will.I.Am Remix) - 4:22 == References == Category:2001 songs Category:Macy Gray songs Category:Black Eyed Peas songs Category:Hip hop songs
title: Request + Line
